description.originalText: Cheniz was a big help. We needed someone on short notice and she was great with our 10 month old. Immediately comfortable, took initiative, friendly, thorough. Would definitely recommend her.

description.displayText:
Cheniz has worked for as for the past four years as a date night sitter and then two years as my nanny. She has a great personality and she loves being around kids. Cheniz is presently a college student who is interested in either full-time or part time employment. 

Cheniz will show up each time with a smile and cheerful attitude, she is an active reliable person with lots to share with your little ones. She is the type of nanny who would take the kids to the park, arrange for play date, sing songs, go to the library and much more.

Cheniz is also communicative and would brief me on her day with the kids. She is also reachable via phone if needed. Most important Cheniz is a trustworthy and has excellent judgement. I have never had a doubt that she would always look for my daughter's best interest.To me it was a peace of mind having her care for my precious one.

description.displayText: Cheniz is wonderful. She is fun, reliable and much more. She is everything I could have ever asked for and my kids love her.
